thread.section_title: Boro Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City, New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: beautiful view - Review
thread.title_full: beautiful view - Review of Boro Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Diana T
title: beautiful view - Review
text:
We had a great experience at the boro hotel. The rooms are very clean, modern and the bed is comfortable. The view from the corner room was breathtaking. Staff are very nice and welcoming.
The only reason I didn't give a 5 star is the parking. Not only is it not included with the hotel fee ($25 extra for parking), but you are not able to take your car out after 11 pm. So public transportation was the only way to get around at night.
